languages.text: {n}Бросив взгляд на тело Инцендии, он мрачно интересуется:{/n} "У Вашей Светлости будут пожелания касательно того, как поступить с останками этой... госпожи?"
{n}He glances at Incendia's body and enquires with grim composure,{/n} "Does Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} have any preference in regard to what should be done with the remains of... the lady?"
languages.original_text: {n}Бросив взгляд на тело Инцендии, он мрачно интересуется:{/n} "У Вашей Светлости будут пожелания касательно того, как поступить с останками этой... госпожи?"

traits.locale_text: {n}He glances at Incendia's body and enquires with grim composure,{/n} "Does Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} has any preference in regard to what should be done with the remains of this... noblewoman?"
{n}He glances at Incendia's body and enquires with grim composure,{/n} "Does Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} has any preference in regard to what should be done with the remains of this... noblewoman?"
{n}He glances at Incendia's body and enquires with grim composure,{/n} "Does Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} have any preference in regard to what should be done with the remains of... the lady?"

{n}He glances at Incendia's body and enquires with grim composure,{/n} "Does Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} have any preference in regard to what should be done with the remains of... the lady?"

languages.text: {n}他看了因森蒂娅的尸体一眼，阴郁而冷静地开了口。{/n}“大人，您认为应当如何处理……因森蒂娅女士的遗体？”
languages.original_text: {n}He glances at Incendia's body and enquires with grim composure,{/n} "Does Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} have any preference in regard to what should be done with the remains of... the lady?"

traits.locale_text: {n}他看了因森蒂娅的尸体一眼，阴郁而冷静地开了口。{/n}“大人，您认为应当如何处理……因森蒂娅女士的遗体？”

languages.text: {n}Er blickt auf Incendias Leiche und fragt düster, aber gefasst:{/n} "Hat Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} einen Wunsch, was mit den Überresten ... der Lady geschehen soll?"
languages.original_text: {n}He glances at Incendia's body and enquires with grim composure,{/n} "Does Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} have any preference in regard to what should be done with the remains of... the lady?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Er blickt auf Incendias Leiche und fragt düster, aber gefasst:{/n} "Hat Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} einen Wunsch, was mit den Überresten ... der Lady geschehen soll?"

languages.text: {n}Il pose un instant les yeux sur le corps d'Incendia et demande, l'air sinistre :{/n} « Votre Seigneurie a-t-elle une préférence concernant la dépouille de... la dame ? »
languages.original_text: {n}He glances at Incendia's body and enquires with grim composure,{/n} "Does Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} have any preference in regard to what should be done with the remains of... the lady?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Il pose un instant les yeux sur le corps d'Incendia et demande, l'air sinistre :{/n} « Votre Seigneurie a-t-elle une préférence concernant la dépouille de... la dame ? »

languages.text: {n}Mira el cadáver de Incendia y, con sombría compostura, pregunta: {/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, ¿tiene alguna preferencia sobre qué hacer con los restos de... la señora?».
languages.original_text: {n}He glances at Incendia's body and enquires with grim composure,{/n} "Does Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} have any preference in regard to what should be done with the remains of... the lady?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Mira el cadáver de Incendia y, con sombría compostura, pregunta: {/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, ¿tiene alguna preferencia sobre qué hacer con los restos de... la señora?».

languages.text: {n}彼はインセンディアの遺体に視線をやり、不機嫌そうにこう尋ねた。{/n}「陛下にご希望はおありですか？インセンディア様の…ご遺体をどうするかに関して」
languages.original_text: {n}He glances at Incendia's body and enquires with grim composure,{/n} "Does Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} have any preference in regard to what should be done with the remains of... the lady?"

traits.locale_text: {n}彼はインセンディアの遺体に視線をやり、不機嫌そうにこう尋ねた。{/n}「陛下にご希望はおありですか？インセンディア様の…ご遺体をどうするかに関して」

languages.text: {n}İncendia'nın naaşına bakıp kasvetli bir ifadeyle konuşuyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, hanımefendinin cenazesiyle... Ne yapmak istersiniz?"
languages.original_text: {n}He glances at Incendia's body and enquires with grim composure,{/n} "Does Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} have any preference in regard to what should be done with the remains of... the lady?"
